welcome_benefits: 3-Month EazyDiner Prime Membership and 500 Bonus EazyPoints

Movie & Dining: 25% Discount With EazyDiner and Additional Instant 20% off Dining Bill (Up to Rs. 500)
Rewards Rate: 2 Reward Points/Rs. 100 Spent. 2X EazyPoints on Dining Spends

fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the Amount or a Minimum of Rs. 300

product_details: This is a lifetime free credit card.
A 3-month EazyDiner Prime Membership can be availed for free as a welcome benefit.
Avail instant discounts on the EazyDiner app and website with the card.
Make contactless payments with EazyDiner and avail huge discounts on restaurant bill payments.
